game.name: Kozue's Strange Journey
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Having barely escaped with her life after being attacked by shadowy monsters, Kozue, and the woman who helped save her decide to team up to investigate the creatures and their connection to reports of mysterious disappearances around town.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Having barely escaped with her life after being attacked by shadowy monsters, Kozue, and the woman who helped save her decide to team up to investigate the creatures and their connection to reports of mysterious disappearances around town.
